patthana1.13:253.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo parittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.13:253.1_1: Sahajātā—mahaggatā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:253.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… pacchājātā—mahaggatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:254.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.13:254.1_1: Sahajātā—appamāṇā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:254.1_2: Pacchājātā—appamāṇā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:255.1_0: Paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
patthana1.13:255.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajāto—paritto eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.13:255.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.13:255.1_3: …pe… khandhā vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo. Vatthu khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.13:255.1_4: ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… asaññasattānaṁ …pe…. Purejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato
patthana1.13:255.1_5: …pe… vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati,
patthana1.13:255.1_7: paccayo. Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa
patthana1.13:255.1_8: …pe… vatthu parittānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—parittā khandhā
patthana1.13:255.1_9: purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Kabaḷīkāro āhāro—imassa kāyassa
patthana1.13:256.1_0: Paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.13:256.1_1: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu mahaggatānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:256.1_2: Purejātaṁ—dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, vatthu
patthana1.13:257.1: Paritto dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—vatthu appamāṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:258.1: Mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Mahaggato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.13:259.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo parittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.13:259.1_1: Sahajātā—mahaggatā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.13:259.1_2: mahaggatā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—mahaggatā khandhā
patthana1.13:260.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo parittassa ca mahaggatassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—mahaggato
patthana1.13:260.1_1: eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo
patthana1.13:261.1: Appamāṇo dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—appamāṇo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.13:262.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.13:262.1_1: Sahajātā—appamāṇā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—appamāṇā
patthana1.13:262.1_2: khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:263.1: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa ca appamāṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— appamāṇo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.13:264.1_0: Paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā parittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.13:264.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajātā—appamāṇā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ
patthana1.13:264.1_2: rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—appamāṇā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca
patthana1.13:264.1_3: imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—appamāṇā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca
patthana1.13:265.1_0: Paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā appamāṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.13:265.1_1: purejātaṁ. Sahajāto—appamāṇo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana1.13:266.1_0: Paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā parittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.13:266.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajātā—mahaggatā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ
patthana1.13:266.1_2: rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca
patthana1.13:266.1_3: kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—mahaggatā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro
patthana1.13:266.1_4: āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—mahaggatā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca
patthana1.13:267.1_0: Paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā mahaggatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.13:267.1_1: purejātaṁ. Sahajāto—mahaggato eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana1.13:267.1_2: paccayo …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggato eko khandho ca vatthu ca
patthana1.13:267.1_3: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā ca vatthu ca …pe… natthipaccayena
patthana1.13:268.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava,
patthana1.13:268.1_1: sahajāte ekādasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi,
patthana1.13:268.1_2: pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane cattāri, kamme satta, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta,
patthana1.13:268.1_3: sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate
patthana1.13:270.1_0: Paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.13:270.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
patthana1.13:270.1_2: paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:271.1: Paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:272.1: Paritto dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:273.1: Mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:274.1: Mahaggato dhammo parittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:275.1: Mahaggato dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:276.1: Mahaggato dhammo parittassa ca mahaggatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:277.1: Appamāṇo dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa (…) sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:278.1: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:279.1: Appamāṇo dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:280.1: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa ca appamāṇassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:281.1: Paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā parittassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.13:282.1: Paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā appamāṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.13:283.1: Paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā parittassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.13:284.1: Paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā mahaggatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.13:285.1_0: Nahetuyā pannarasa, naārammaṇe pannarasa, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare pannarasa,
patthana1.13:285.1_1: nasahajāte dvādasa, naaññamaññe dvādasa, nanissaye dvādasa, naupanissaye cuddasa,
patthana1.13:285.1_2: napurejāte cuddasa, napacchājāte pannarasa, naāsevane pannarasa …pe… namagge pannarasa,
patthana1.13:285.1_3: nasampayutte dvādasa, navippayutte dasa, noatthiyā dasa, nonatthiyā pannarasa, novigate
patthana1.13:287.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe
patthana1.13:287.1_1: tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta …pe… namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi,
patthana1.13:287.1_2: navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.13:289.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava,
patthana1.13:289.1_1: sahajāte ekādasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi,
patthana1.13:289.1_2: pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane cattāri, kamme satta …pe… magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi,
patthana1.13:289.1_3: vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate terasa.
